title: City App Schema
description: Schema for city application YAML files

name.description: The name of the city application

provider.description: The organization or company that provides the application

short_description.description: A brief description of the application's purpose and functionality

website.description: The official website URL for the application

contact.description: Contact information for the application provider

email.description: Email address or contact form URL

deployed_in_municipalities.description: List of municipalities where the application is deployed

opencode_repository.description: URL to the open source code repository

modules.description: List of module file paths relative to the application directory

development_status.description: Current development status of the application

last_update.description: Date of the last update in YYYY-MM-DD format
